actions.message: GL and HF!
yeah, it looks like there are no real issues on github
i think per said it's about to go to beta
hmm, so only L&N can run a rout through Louiville, but everyone can bypass it by the looks?
yeah
you can end your route there
hmm. Apparently I screwed up the can buy company in OR 1 thing
how so?
I would have to. It is a weird rule.
I thought it was going to prompt me last turn but it went straight to the SR
buy the private
Corps can buy one private for face value in OR1. After that, you have to wait until phase 3.
yeah... its weird
And I dont know exactly when it expects you to?
But at that point, can buy for 0.5-1.5x face value.
bc there is no buy companies phase
Might need some work on implementation.
yeah its fine. Well I guess Im runnning one 2T
oh thats nice, the civil war doesnt make you lose share value with 1 train
yeah, it technically runs. just with 0 revenue
That is nice. Fair, I think.
lol, this is my first time playing
How do I make money?
I mean this title
its just the civil war event. Happens once when the last 3T is bought
for 1 turn, your lowest rev train makes 0
I'm in an async game of TN, but it is tough to get a feel that way, I think, so in many ways, this is my first game of TN, too.
which in your case was your only train
this has a good rundown on the mcguffins in this game: https://github.com/tobymao/18xx/wiki/18TN
what does 31/2 do?
its just another 3 train?
yeah
it just signifies when the civil war is triggered
it's the fifth 3
It is just a 3, but when the first 3' is bought is Civil War. Similarly, the 6 and 6' are the same, but when the first 6' is bought, the 4s become obsolete.
same with 61/2
cool
Thanks
np
An interesting design. It feels a little unbalanced, at least at 4 - not enough players stuck with only 1 corp for safe share purchases, so the players who get 2 have an enormous advantage. But fun.
I would like to try it at 3 or 5 sometime.
yeah, I would like it much more id it were not train buy limited early
That doesn't bother me that much, but I had a lot of cash with no safe place to park it for a good portion of the game. Might be because GMO was orange for so long, but it is hard to tell.
Yes, I know I should have bought my 1 share of NC&StL a SR earlier.
But still...

I mean, I would try it again at 4, but my impression is it has problems at 4. At 5, there would be 4 corps that were the only corp for a player (no dumping likely), and at 3, everyone gets 2. But 4...
You know?
yeah, i honestly haven't played it enough to tell
yeah that does make sense
the train limit prevents a real aggro dumping strategy
I get that. And you and star might not have noticed the issue the same way I did this game, since you had the two corps.
Still, good game all!
i did
yep, gg
for sure. i was able to do a bit of train shuffling
even if it goofed it up
you and wynad were not
yeah good game
thanks for the quick play
And that always helps, but I knew that if I bought a second share of either of star's corps (and probably nigel's), I would find myself the proud President of a broke trainless corp next SR.
star has done that to me at least once :D
see, I am just beinga good teacher, you have learned what to expect!

title: 18TN
description: Open. Live. Let's dynamite some mountains
